headline: IRTC Unveils Positive AMALFI Trial Data Showing Higher AF Detection
summary: iRhythm's AMALFI trial shows its Zio monitoring service boosts AF detection and speeds diagnosis, strengthening its edge in cardiac care.

headline: Grand River Aseptic Manufacturing (GRAM) Appoints Denis Johnson as Chief Executive Officer
summary: Effective September 1, 2025 Denis Johnson, CEO Denis Johnson, CEO, Grand River Aseptic Manufacturing Grand Rapids, Michigan, Sept. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Grand River Aseptic Manufacturing (“GRAM” or the “Company”), a portfolio company of Arlington Capital Partners, today announced the promotion of Denis Johnson to Chief Executive Officer, effective September 1, 2025. Mr. Johnson has served as President of GRAM since March 31, 2025. In this new role, Mr. Johnson will lead GRAM’s next phase

headline: Boston Scientific announces 2025 Investor Day meeting and conference call discussing third quarter 2025 results
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE: BSX) will host a meeting with the investor community to review its financial goals and long-term growth strategies on Tuesday, September 30, 2025, beginning at 8:30 a.m. ET.
